comments.body: IDEA editor always shows warnings on the two lines, change them to avoid warnings.

Is this the same for all trees -- it's a property of all of the input?
Also are there callers that can't precompute and pass this -- do you need Option?

Yes
the input `RDD[Instance]` for each tree are differect (because labels are different), but the computation of `DecisionTreemetadata` do use labels.
So it is the same for all trees.

> are there callers that can't precompute and pass this

this method is indirectly used in DecisionTree/RandomForest in both .ml/.mllib sides.
Other algs will compute `DecisionTreemetadata` only once, in this method.

It will cause many changes if we precomupte `DecisionTreemetadata` outside and pass it to this method.
